titles.title: I Love I Love My Master (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I love I love my Master I will not go out free For He is my Redeemer He paid the price for me I would not leave His service It is so sweet and blest And in the weariest moments He gives the truest rest{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My Master shed His life-blood My vassal life to win And save me from the bondage Of tyrant self and sin He chose me for His service And gave me power to choose That blessed perfect freedom Which I shall never lose{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I would not halve my service His only it must be His only who so loved me And gave Himself for me Rejoicing and adoring Henceforth my song shall be I love I love my Master I will not go out free{/lang-eng}
